question: The mobile application 'Humsafar', which was in news recently, is associated with which service?
explanation:
The Labour Minister Santosh Gangwar recently launched the mobile application named \'Humsafar\'. The app is launched with an objective of delivering fuel at the door-steps of Housing societies, hotels and hospitals in the National capital region.
The app will ensure the delivery of fuel to other bulk buyers of diesel in various NCR cities. This step would curb the unsafe practices of transporting fuel in the city.
